title: The amazing beauty benefits of banana peels
text: We are all familiar with the nutritional benefits of bananas and the important role it plays in a diet. But its peels are discarded as many of us do not know about the amazing beauty benefits if offers, if used topically. Banana peels contain essential antioxidants and minerals along with moisturising properties which make them a great addition to one’s beauty regime. In fact, banana peels are used by quite a few people as an inexpensive alternative to beautify themselves. To know more about the benefits, read on.
description: Don’t throw away those banana peels just yet. Use the fruit to its full potential by treating some beauty woes with it.
